The correct answer is B: The Control Centre panel with toggles like Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and music controls.

In the provided excerpt, the narrator is explaining how to customize the Control Centre by adding new features such as Screen Recording. To demonstrate this, they open the Control Centre panel, which displays various toggles including Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and music controls. The narrator then proceeds to show how to add the Screen Recording feature to the Control Centre. Therefore, option B accurately describes the on-screen view that is shown during this part of the tutorial.
The visual element that appears on the timeline after adding a music track and a short instrumental snippet is option B: The Soundtrack browser showing Apple-provided music options.
